How can I bridge from Ethereum to Verus using Verus Mobile?

To bridge from Ethereum to Verus using Verus Mobile, please refer to the instructions provided in the article "How to participate in the Verus Ethereum Bridge Launch" on Medium. Specifically, follow the steps outlined in the article, excluding the part on preconverting.

# How to bridge from Ethereum to Verus

Please read the first parts of [this article](https://medium.com/veruscoin/how-to-participate-in-the-verus-ethereum-bridge-launch-73aeeae1c76a). You can skip the part on preconverting.
